biography_text: GARRETT, Thomas Alexander Jr., a Representative from Virginia; born in Atlanta, Fulton County, Georgia, March 27, 1972; graduated from Louisa County High School, Mineral, Va., 1990; B.A., University of Richmond, Richmond, Va., 1994; J.D., University of Richmond, Richmond, Va., 2002; United States Army, 1995-2000; assistant attorney general, Va., 2002-2007; Louisa County commonwealth attorney, 2008-2012; member of the Virginia state senate, 2012-2016; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
